author: Stereogum
title: Watch A Full-Strength Broken Social Scene Play A Gorgeous “Halfway Home” On Colbert
text: Yesterday, reactivated Canadian guitar army Broken Social Scene shared " Halfway Home ," their first new song in seven years. And last night, they showed up, at something like full strength, to perform the song on Stephen Colbert's Late Show. I couldn't get an exact count, but the band had something like 15 people onstage, including … More »
